title: Amazon Brand - Amazon Fresh Sweet & Spicy Trail Mix, 16 Ounce, Pack of 2 (Previously Happy Belly)
features: Mix includes hot & spicy peanuts, butter toffee peanuts, Cajun sesame sticks, toasted corn, honey sesame sticks and almonds
Spicy Cajun-flavored mix with notes of sesame and honey
Satisfaction Guarantee: We're proud of our products. If you aren't satisfied, we'll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase.
description: Happy Belly Sweet & Spicy Trail Mix is the best of both tasty worlds. First, we balance out hot-and-spicy peanuts with sweet butter toffee peanuts. Then, we add two kinds of sesame sticks, spicy Cajun and sweet honey, for a satisfying crunch. Toasted corn, U.S. Select Sheller Run (SSR) almonds, and sea salt round out this dynamic mix. Enjoy as an on-the-go snack for everyday adventures. A stand-up, resealable bag helps ensure maximum freshness, all the way down to the last handful. May contain an occasional nut shell fragment.

title: REVIEW Amazon Brand - Happy Belly Sweet & Spicy Trail Mix
